p: In the present study, EO compositions of twelve Iranian M. chamomilla populations collected from diverse regions were qualitatively and quantitatively assessed. Since the main radical scavengers are phenolics, flavonoids being the major group within phenolics [ 22], our study was also designed to determine apigenin and luteolin contents, as its main flavonoid aglycons [ 19, 23], by utilizing analytical HPLC. Antiradical capacities of the extracts with DPPH and ORAC assays were also compared. In order to make comparison, the plants were harvested at the same flourishing period. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first report of these populations.
